content.text: Kyuji is a Marine chef, Koda's husband, and Moda's father.
Kyuji has light curly hair, with a darker mustache and beard. He wears a chef's hat and an apron with the Marine emblem, a collared shirt with the sleeves rolled up, as well as dark shoes and pants.
He loves his daughter very much, and was very happy to see her come home.
As he is a Marine chef, his cooking skills are assumed to be good enough for the Marines.
He was seen smiling as his wife hugged their daughter upon her return home.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Anime — Episode 381, Kyuji and his family appear in the newspaper Crocus is reading.
↑  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 213), His name is revealed.
